title: Trump plans to weaken vehicle mileage rules that limit air pollution
description: President Donald Trump is expected to announce a proposal to weaken vehicle mileage rules for the auto industry
content: WASHINGTON -- WASHINGTON (AP) President Donald Trump is expected to announce a proposal Wednesday to weaken vehicle mileage rules for the auto industry, loosening regulatory pressure on automakers to… [+4180 chars]
